description: END the frustration of not having the skills to bring your ideas to life in this tech-driven world.   In this 3 in 3 challenge you will learn how to program in the most popular Web Framework - Ruby on Rails.  You'll graduate with 3 awesome replicas of Evernote, Pinterest and a Blog alll in just 3 weeks.  All custom designs and my codebase will be provided (designers are encouraged to run wild).  Enter to WIN a  3 PRIZE BUNDLE of (Dropbox 1-yr + $70 Sublime Text Editor + Buffer Awesome Plan 1-yr) all worth ~$300 just for taking this class.  More info on entering this contest will be given in the intro videos.
title: Ruby on Rails in 3 Weeks  -- Build Evernote, Pinterest and Wordpress
